com.hdcookbook.grin.parser
Class ShowBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.hdcookbook.grin.parser.ShowBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
GuiShowBuilder, MosaicShowBuilder
public class ShowBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class for parsing a show. Clients of the parser can subclass this to intercept items as there's encountered.
